meanings.definition: To bring into agreement or accord

meanings.sent2: She enjoys harmonising different opinions to reach a compromise.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were harmonising their schedules to plan a surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the painting were harmonising beautifully, creating a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: His speech was like harmonising different melodies into one beautiful song.
